                          Quick & Dirty Report for opt

           API=optapi DObject=TGmsOptions DUnit=gmsoptions Prefix=opt
                            generated by apiwrapper

Properties
  optCount        : Integer r     number of options
  optMessageCount : Integer r     number of messages in buffer
  optGroupCount   : Integer r     number of option groups
  optRecentEnabled: Integer r w

Functions and Procedures
  optReadDefinition      read definition file
  optReadParameterFile   read parameters from file
  optReadFromStr         read parameters from string
  optWriteParameterFile  write modified parameters
  optClearMessages       clear messages
  optAddMessage          add message to message queue
  optGetMessage          read from message queue
  optResetAll            reset all defined and definedR flags
  optResetAllRecent      reset all definedR flags
  optResetRecentChanges  reset all options with definedR flag set
  optShowHelp            write help help for option(s)
  optResetNr             reset option value to default
  optFindStr             find option by name return number and ref nr
  optGetInfoNr           info using number returns defined reference number and the type
  optGetValuesNr         read values
  optSetValuesNr         set values
  optSetValues2Nr        set second values
  optVersion             get version number of object
  optDefinitionFile      get last processed definition file
  optGetFromAnyStrList   read/remove queued strings from string list
  optGetFromListStr      read/remove queued strings from specified option
  optListCountStr        number of elements stored in list
  optReadFromListStr     read element iPos from list
  optSynonymCount        number of synonyms
  optGetSynonym          get synonym and original option name
  optEchoSet             set echo of input on or off
  optEOLOnlySet          sets default EOLOnly returns previous value
  optNoBoundsSet         sets bound checking on or off
  optErrorCount          retrieve number of errors / warnings from message queue
  optGetBoundsInt        bounds and default for integer option
  optGetBoundsDbl        bounds and default for double option
  optGetDefaultStr       default value for a given string option
  optGetIntNr            read integer by number
  optGetInt2Nr           read second integer by number
  optSetIntNr            set integer by number
  optSetInt2Nr           set second integer by number
  optGetStrNr            read string by number
  optGetOptHelpNr        get name, help context and group
  optGetEnumHelp         help text for enumerated value
  optGetEnumStrNr        enumerated string value and ordinal
  optGetEnumCount        number of enumerations in option
  optGetEnumValue        enumerated value by ordinal number
  optGetStr2Nr           read second string by number
  optSetStrNr            set string by number
  optSetStr2Nr           set second string by number
  optGetDblNr            read double by number
  optGetDbl2Nr           read second double by number
  optSetDblNr            set double by number
  optSetDbl2Nr           set second double by number
  optGetValStr           read value as string by option name
  optGetVal2Str          read second value as string by option name
  optGetNameNr           option name by number
  optGetDefinedNr        get defined status by number
  optGetHelpNr           name and help by number
  optGetGroupNr          group information by number
  optGetGroupGrpNr       find group record by group number
  optGetOptGroupNr       group number of an option
  optGetDotOptNr         dot option info
  optGetDotOptUel        individual elements from a dot option
  optGetIndicatorNr      indicator info
  optGetEquIndicatorNr   equation part of indicator
  optGetVarIndicatorNr   variable part of indicator
  optIndicatorCount      indicators available and number ignored
  optDotOptCount         dot options available and number ignored
  optSetRefNr            set reference number by option number
  optSetRefNrStr         set reference number by option name
  optGetConstName        names of various constants
  optGetTypeName         name of a type
  optLookUp              index number of an option
  optReadFromPChar       Reads options from a PChar


Documented Arguments
--------------------
ADVal      option double value
AGroup     group number
AHelp      one line help text
AIVal      option integer value
AName      option name
ANr        ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
ARefNr     option reference number
ASVal      option string value


Calling Sequences in Delphi Style
---------------------------------


optAddMessage  proc    add message to message queue
  const info     : ShortString


optClearMessages  proc    clear messages


optCount  prop:Integer r   number of options


optDefinitionFile  proc    get last processed definition file
    var sfilename: ShortString


optDotOptCount  func:Integer   dot options available and number ignored
    var ANrErrors: Integer


optEchoSet  proc    set echo of input on or off
        V        : Integer


optEOLOnlySet  func:Integer   sets default EOLOnly returns previous value
        ival     : Integer


optErrorCount  proc    retrieve number of errors / warnings from message queue
    var iErrors  : Integer
    var iWarnings: Integer


optFindStr  func:Integer   find option by name return number and ref nr
  const AName    : ShortString option name
    var ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var ARefNr   : Integer     option reference number


optGetBoundsDbl  func:Integer   bounds and default for double option
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var dlval    : Double
    var dhval    : Double
    var ddval    : Double


optGetBoundsInt  func:Integer   bounds and default for integer option
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var ilval    : Integer
    var ihval    : Integer
    var idval    : Integer


optGetConstName  func:Integer   names of various constants
        cgroup   : Integer
        cindex   : Integer
    var cname    : ShortString


optGetDbl2Nr  func:Integer   read second double by number
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var ADVal    : Double  option double value


optGetDblNr  func:Integer   read double by number
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var ADVal    : Double  option double value


optGetDefaultStr  func:Integer   default value for a given string option
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var sval     : ShortString


optGetDefinedNr  func:Integer   get defined status by number
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var AIVal    : Integer option integer value


optGetDotOptNr  func:Integer   dot option info
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var AName    : ShortString option name
    var AObjNr   : Integer
    var ADim     : Integer
    var AValue   : Double


optGetDotOptUel  func:Integer   individual elements from a dot option
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
        ADim     : Integer
    var AUEL     : ShortString


optGetEnumCount  func:Integer   number of enumerations in option
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var ACount   : Integer


optGetEnumHelp  func:Integer   help text for enumerated value
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
        AOrd     : Integer
    var AHc      : Integer
    var AHelpStr : ShortString


optGetEnumStrNr  func:Integer   enumerated string value and ordinal
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var ASVal    : ShortString option string value
    var AOrd     : Integer


optGetEnumValue  func:Integer   enumerated value by ordinal number
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
        AOrd     : Integer
    var AValInt  : Integer
    var AValStr  : ShortString


optGetEquIndicatorNr  func:Integer   equation part of indicator
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
        ADim     : Integer
    var AIndex   : ShortString


optGetFromAnyStrList  func:Integer   read/remove queued strings from string list
        idash    : Integer
    var skey     : ShortString
    var sval     : ShortString


optGetFromListStr  func:Integer   read/remove queued strings from specified option
  const skey     : ShortString
    var sval     : ShortString


optGetGroupGrpNr  func:Integer   find group record by group number
        AGroup   : Integer group number


optGetGroupNr  func:Integer   group information by number
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var AName    : ShortString option name
    var AGroup   : Integer     group number
    var AHc      : Integer
    var AHelp    : ShortString one line help text


optGetHelpNr  func:Integer   name and help by number
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var ASOpt    : ShortString
    var ASHelp   : ShortString


optGetIndicatorNr  func:Integer   indicator info
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var EquName  : ShortString
    var VarName  : ShortString
    var EquDim   : Integer
    var VarDim   : Integer
    var AValue   : Integer


optGetInfoNr  func:Integer   info using number returns defined reference number and the type
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var ADefined : Integer
    var ADefinedR: Integer
    var ARefNr   : Integer option reference number
    var ADataType: Integer
    var AOptType : Integer
    var ASubType : Integer


optGetInt2Nr  func:Integer   read second integer by number
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var AIVal    : Integer option integer value


optGetIntNr  func:Integer   read integer by number
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var AIVal    : Integer option integer value


optGetMessage  proc    read from message queue
        N        : Integer
    var info     : ShortString
    var iType    : Integer


optGetNameNr  func:Integer   option name by number
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var ASName   : ShortString


optGetOptGroupNr  func:Integer   group number of an option
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount


optGetOptHelpNr  func:Integer   get name, help context and group
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var AName    : ShortString option name
    var AHc      : Integer
    var AGroup   : Integer     group number


optGetStr2Nr  func:Integer   read second string by number
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var ASVal    : ShortString option string value


optGetStrNr  func:Integer   read string by number
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var ASVal    : ShortString option string value


optGetSynonym  func:Integer   get synonym and original option name
        N        : Integer
    var SSyn     : ShortString
    var SName    : ShortString


optGetTypeName  func:Integer   name of a type
        TNr      : Integer
    var sTName   : ShortString


optGetVal2Str  func:Integer   read second value as string by option name
  const AName    : ShortString option name
    var ASVal    : ShortString option string value


optGetValStr  func:Integer   read value as string by option name
  const AName    : ShortString option name
    var ASVal    : ShortString option string value


optGetValuesNr  func:Integer   read values
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
    var ASName   : ShortString
    var AIVal    : Integer     option integer value
    var ADVal    : Double      option double value
    var ASVal    : ShortString option string value


optGetVarIndicatorNr  func:Integer   variable part of indicator
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
        ADim     : Integer
    var AIndex   : ShortString


optGroupCount  prop:Integer r   number of option groups


optIndicatorCount  func:Integer   indicators available and number ignored
    var ANrErrors: Integer


optListCountStr  func:Integer   number of elements stored in list
  const skey     : ShortString


optLookUp  func:Integer   index number of an option
  const AOpt     : ShortString


optMessageCount  prop:Integer r   number of messages in buffer


optNoBoundsSet  proc    sets bound checking on or off
        ival     : Integer


optReadDefinition  func:Integer   read definition file
  const fn       : ShortString


optReadFromListStr  func:Integer   read element iPos from list
  const skey     : ShortString
        iPos     : Integer
    var sval     : ShortString


optReadFromPChar  proc    Reads options from a PChar
        p        : PChar


optReadFromStr  proc    read parameters from string
  const s        : ShortString


optReadParameterFile  func:Integer   read parameters from file
  const fn       : ShortString


optRecentEnabled  prop:Integer r w


optResetAll  proc    reset all defined and definedR flags


optResetAllRecent  proc    reset all definedR flags


optResetNr  func:Integer   reset option value to default
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount


optResetRecentChanges  proc    reset all options with definedR flag set


optSetDbl2Nr  func:Integer   set second double by number
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
        ADVal    : Double  option double value


optSetDblNr  func:Integer   set double by number
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
        ADVal    : Double  option double value


optSetInt2Nr  func:Integer   set second integer by number
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
        AIVal    : Integer option integer value


optSetIntNr  func:Integer   set integer by number
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
        AIVal    : Integer option integer value


optSetRefNr  func:Integer   set reference number by option number
        ANr      : Integer ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
        AValue   : Integer


optSetRefNrStr  func:Integer   set reference number by option name
  const AOpt     : ShortString
        AValue   : Integer


optSetStr2Nr  func:Integer   set second string by number
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
  const ASVal    : ShortString option string value


optSetStrNr  func:Integer   set string by number
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
  const ASVal    : ShortString option string value


optSetValues2Nr  func:Integer   set second values
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
        AIVal    : Integer     option integer value
        ADVal    : Double      option double value
  const ASVal    : ShortString option string value


optSetValuesNr  func:Integer   set values
        ANr      : Integer     ordinal option number - an integer between 1..optCount
        AIVal    : Integer     option integer value
        ADVal    : Double      option double value
  const ASVal    : ShortString option string value


optShowHelp  proc    write help help for option(s)
  const HlpID    : ShortString


optSynonymCount  func:Integer   number of synonyms


optVersion  proc    get version number of object
    var sversion : ShortString


optWriteParameterFile  func:Integer   write modified parameters
  const fn       : ShortString


Constants
---------

const optDataNone    = 0;  { optDataType }
      optDataInteger = 1;
      optDataDouble  = 2;
      optDataString  = 3;
      optDataStrList = 4;

const optTypeInteger   = 0;  { optOptionType }
      optTypeDouble    = 1;
      optTypeString    = 2;
      optTypeBoolean   = 3;
      optTypeEnumStr   = 4;
      optTypeEnumInt   = 5;
      optTypeMultiList = 6;
      optTypeStrList   = 7;
      optTypeMacro     = 8;
      optTypeImmediate = 9;

const optsubRequired = 0;  { optOptionSubType }
      optsubNoValue  = 1;
      optsubOptional = 2;
      optsub2Values  = 3;

const optMsgInputEcho    = 0;  { optMsgType }
      optMsgHelp         = 1;
      optMsgDefineError  = 2;
      optMsgValueError   = 3;
      optMsgValueWarning = 4;
      optMsgDeprecated   = 5;
      optMsgFileEnter    = 6;
      optMsgFileLeave    = 7;
      optMsgTooManyMsgs  = 8;
      optMsgUserError    = 9;

----------------------

ADataType
ADefined
ADefinedR
ADim

AIndex
